title: Paying/trading very generously for t210 orange/pink/yellow borders
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Paying/trading very generously for t210 orange/pink/yellow borders
posts.post_content:
Always on the lookout for any t210 border variants.  I'd love a yellow in particular if one ever turns up.  I'll pay/trade well above the premium value that even these go for if anyone has any they're willing to part with, regardless of the condition.  

I have a large list of cards I can offer up in trade as well.  Thanks in advance guys!

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
